A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First time I ever came out of a Star Wars movie thinking I never want to see that again. Seemed to largely ignore the E7 plot\, long periods of the movie seemed utterly pointless and indulgent. Not sure what the critics saw in it\, but the fans have certainly spoken. An abomination. They have a massive repair job to do\, a lot of damage has been done.
